# iosxr_policy_global_set (Resource)

This resource can manage the Policy Global Set configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_policy_global_set" "example" {
  rpl = "policy-global\n  GLOBAL1 'global1',\n  GLOBAL2 'global2'\nend-global\n"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `rpl` (String) Configures a policy global set

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_policy_global_set.example ""
```
